name: erc8004-mcp
description: MCP server for ERC-8004 trustless AI agent on-chain identity. 11 tools for registering, discovering, and managing agents as ERC-721 NFTs across BSC, Ethereum, and EVM-compatible networks.

install.source: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build && node dist/index.js

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Wallet private key (0x-prefixed) for write operations (register, set_uri, set_metadata, submit_reputation). Optional for read-only usage.

RPC_URL.description: Override default RPC endpoint. Chain-specific RPCs are built in.

CHAIN_ID.description: Default chain ID. Tools accept chain per-call.

tools.name: register_agent
tools.description: Register a new ERC-8004 AI agent on-chain as an ERC-721 NFT

tools.name: get_agent
tools.description: Look up an agent by token ID

tools.name: list_agents
tools.description: List agents owned by an address

tools.name: get_agent_count
tools.description: Get total registered agents on a chain

tools.name: search_agents
tools.description: Search agents by name, service, or metadata

tools.name: get_reputation
tools.description: Get reputation data for an agent

tools.name: set_metadata
tools.description: Set on-chain key-value metadata for an agent

tools.name: get_metadata
tools.description: Read an on-chain metadata value by key

tools.name: batch_get_metadata
tools.description: Read multiple metadata values in one call

resources.name: chains
resources.description: All supported chain configurations with contract addresses
